definition: "cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 27), occurring in 原, 历, 压 etc

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: He used to work in our factory.
We have added two more of the latest assembly lines in our factory.
sentences.chinese: 我们厂子又添设了两条最先进的生产线。

sentences.english: But factories like this face a challenge.
sentences.chinese: 但是这些厂子也面临一个挑战。

sentences.english: She does the least work in this factory.
sentences.chinese: 她在这个厂子干最少的活。

sentences.english: Some officials will look over our factory this Friday.
sentences.chinese: 本周五一些官员将察看我们的厂子。
他们在新厂子成立了工会。

sentences.english: The Hailin machinery makes the processing for the factory, has the mold, very good dry.
sentences.chinese: 海林机械给厂子里做加工，有模具，很好干。

sentences.english: The factory has laid off 40 of its 100 workers.
sentences.chinese: 厂子因此从100名雇员中辞退了40名。

definition: "cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 27), occurring in 原, 历, 压 etc
li (Chinese unit of length equal to 500 meters)
a building used as a factory/factory (building)/CL:座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]
